props.name: new Resize
props.desc: Resize image filter class

props.name: lanczosLobes
props.desc: LanczosLobes parameter for lanczos filter, valid for resizeType lanczos

props.name: resizeType
props.desc: Resize type for webgl resizeType is just lanczos, for canvas2d can be: bilinear, hermite, sliceHack, lanczos.

props.name: scaleX
props.desc: Scale factor for resizing, x axis

props.name: scaleY
props.desc: Scale factor for resizing, y axis

props.name: type
props.desc: Filter type

props.name: applyTo
props.desc: Apply the resize filter to the image Determines whether to use WebGL or Canvas2D based on the options.webgl flag.

props.name: applyTo2d
props.desc: Applies filter to canvas element

props.name: applyToWebGL
props.desc: Apply this filter using webgl.

props.name: bilinearFiltering
props.desc: bilinearFiltering

props.name: createHelpLayer
props.desc: If needed by a 2d filter, this functions can create an helper canvas to be used remember that options.targetCanvas is available for use till end of chain.

props.name: createProgram
props.desc: Compile this filter's shader program.

props.name: generateShader
props.desc: Generate vertex and shader sources from the necessary steps numbers

props.name: getAttributeLocations
props.desc: Return a map of attribute names to WebGLAttributeLocation objects.

props.name: getUniformLocations
props.desc: Return WebGL uniform locations for this filter's shader.

props.name: hermiteFastResize
props.desc: hermiteFastResize

props.name: initialize
props.desc: Constructor

props.name: isNeutralState
props.desc: Generic isNeutral implementation for one parameter based filters. Used only in image applyFilters to discard filters that will not have an effect on the image Other filters may need their own version ( ColorMatrix, HueRotation, gamma, ComposedFilter )

props.name: lanczosResize
props.desc: Filter lanczosResize

props.name: retrieveShader
props.desc: Retrieves the cached shader.

props.name: sendAttributeData
props.desc: Send attribute data from this filter to its shader program on the GPU.

props.name: sendUniformData
props.desc: Send data from this filter to its shader program's uniforms.

props.name: setOptions
props.desc: Sets filter's properties from options

props.name: sliceByTwo
props.desc: Filter sliceByTwo

props.name: toJSON
props.desc: Returns a JSON representation of an instance

props.name: toObject
props.desc: Returns object representation of an instance
